waterchem.calcite.PCO2FromSolution¶

waterchem.calcite.PCO2FromSolution(sol)[source]¶

Calculate partial pressure of CO2 from a solution object.

Parameters:

sol : solution object
Returns:

pCO2 : float

partial pressure of CO2 for the solution

Notes

Assumes a H20-CO2-CaCO3 system. Uses equation 2.30 from Dreybrodt (1988) and assumes an open system.

waterchem.calcite.H2CO3sfromPCO2

Next topic

waterchem.calcite.activityHFromPCO2
